data.name: RetryJobMessage
data.value: Retrying transfer job - attempt {0} of {1}.

data.name: TransferFileDownloadWarningNoRetryMessage
data.value: {0} download failed: {1} - This job is configured to skip this file-level issue.

data.name: TransferFileUploadWarningNoRetryMessage
data.value: {0} upload failed: {1} - This job is configured to skip this file-level issue.

data.name: TransferFileDownloadWarningMessage
data.value: {0} download failed: {1} - Retrying in {2} seconds. {3} tries left.

data.name: TransferFileUploadWarningMessage
data.value: {0} upload failed: {1} - Retrying in {2} seconds. {3} tries left.

data.name: TransferJobEndedMessage
data.value: File transfer job ended.

data.name: TransferJobEndedMaxRetryMessage
data.value: File transfer job exceeded the max number of retries.

data.name: TransferJobCanceledMessage
data.value: File transfer job was canceled.

data.name: TransferJobExceptionMessage
data.value: A serious error occurred transferring the requested files.

data.name: TransferJobNullExceptionMessage
data.value: This operation cannot be performed because the file transfer job hasn't been created.

data.name: TransferPathArgumentDownloadSourcePathExceptionMessage
data.value: The transfer path must define a valid server-side source path and suggests a problem with the artifact data.

data.name: TransferPathArgumentDownloadTargetPathExceptionMessage
data.value: The transfer path must define a valid client-side target path and suggests an export configuration issue.

data.name: TransferPathArgumentUploadSourcePathExceptionMessage
data.value: The transfer path must define a valid client-side source path and suggests a problem with the mapped source path.

data.name: TransferPathArgumentUploadTargetPathExceptionMessage
data.value: The transfer path must define a valid server-side target path and suggests an import configuration issue.

data.name: TransferJobStartedMessage
data.value: File transfer job started.

data.name: WorkspaceExceptionMessage
data.value: The workspace artifact must be specified.

data.name: WebModeFallbackPermissionsFatalExceptionMessage
data.value: A fatal file transfer error occurred due to insufficient permissions and cannot be resolved by switching to web mode. Error: {0}

data.name: WebModeFallbackAlreadyWebModeFatalExceptionMessage
data.value: A fatal file transfer error occurred and an attempt has already been made to resolve the issue by switching to web mode. Check the logs for more details or contact your system administrator for assistance if this problem persists.

data.name: WebModeFallbackNoErrorWarningMessage
data.value: Switching to web mode due to a serious error within the '{0}' transfer job.

data.name: WebModeFallbackWarningMessage
data.value: Switching to web mode due to a serious error within the '{0}' transfer job. Error: {1}

data.value: (no endpoint was provided)

data.name: NoMessageProvided
data.value: (no message was provided)

data.name: HttpBadRequestFatalMessage
data.value: This error is considered fatal and suggests either an authentication issue or a version incompatibility between the client and server.

data.name: HttpForbiddenFatalMessage
data.value: This error is considered fatal and suggests the client is forbidden from making the HTTP Web service call and is likely a problem with expired credentials or authentication.

data.name: HttpNotFoundFatalMessage
data.value: This error is considered fatal and suggests the HTTP Web service endpoint is not found and a potential version incompatibility exists between the client and server.

data.name: HttpUnauthorizedFatalMessage
data.value: This error is considered fatal and suggests the client is unauthorized from making the HTTP Web service call and is likely a problem with expired credentials or authentication.

data.name: WebExceptionTrustFailureMessage
data.value: This error is considered fatal and suggests a server has not been properly setup with an SSL certificate or the SSL certificate is no longer valid.
